DataSource.Query: SELECT transactions.non_gl_stock_master.transaction_ts, transactions.non_gl_stock_master.value_date, office.users.user_name AS entered_by, office.offices.office_name, transactions.non_gl_stock_master.statement_reference, core.parties.party_name, core.price_types.price_type_name FROM transactions.non_gl_stock_master INNER JOIN office.offices ON transactions.non_gl_stock_master.office_id = office.offices.office_id INNER JOIN office.users ON transactions.non_gl_stock_master.user_id = office.users.user_id INNER JOIN core.parties ON transactions.non_gl_stock_master.party_id = core.parties.party_id INNER JOIN core.price_types ON transactions.non_gl_stock_master.price_type_id = core.price_types.price_type_id WHERE transactions.non_gl_stock_master.non_gl_stock_master_id=@non_gl_stock_master_id;

SELECT core.items.item_code, core.items.item_name, transactions.non_gl_stock_details.quantity, core.units.unit_name, transactions.non_gl_stock_details.price, transactions.non_gl_stock_details.price * transactions.non_gl_stock_details.quantity AS amount, transactions.non_gl_stock_details.discount, (transactions.non_gl_stock_details.price * transactions.non_gl_stock_details.quantity) - transactions.non_gl_stock_details.discount AS sub_total, transactions.non_gl_stock_details.tax, (transactions.non_gl_stock_details.price * transactions.non_gl_stock_details.quantity) - transactions.non_gl_stock_details.discount + transactions.non_gl_stock_details.tax AS total FROM transactions.non_gl_stock_details INNER JOIN core.items ON transactions.non_gl_stock_details.item_id = core.items.item_id INNER JOIN core.units ON transactions.non_gl_stock_details.unit_id = core.units.unit_id WHERE transactions.non_gl_stock_details.non_gl_stock_master_id = ( select transactions.non_gl_stock_master.non_gl_stock_master_id FROM transactions.non_gl_stock_master WHERE transactions.non_gl_stock_master.non_gl_stock_master_id=@non_gl_stock_master_id ) ORDER BY transactions.non_gl_stock_details.non_gl_stock_detail_id;
